mean_cn: n.抑郁，沮丧；不景气，萧条（期）
mean_en: a period when there is little economic activity and many people are poor or without jobs
sentence: After the divorce she sank into a deep depression; she barely ate or slept.
sentence_trans: 离婚后她沉浸在极度的抑郁中，几乎不吃不睡。
word_etyma: de向下 + press挤压 + ion名词后缀 → 向下挤压 → 沮丧；萧条
